page.title: 03Education
page.content: At our school we have two teachers but Mr Taylor the Headteacher is in Harbottle school for half of each day. Mrs Hedley is the Assistant Teacher and was at one time Headteacher at Windyhagh school, which is closed. There are at present 11 children full-time and 3 part-timers,4 years old who will come full-time next term. Only one part-timer lives in the village. All the rest come by car. There is a Nursery twice a week held by a qualified teacher.We have 3 class -rooms one room is used by the nursery.The school was built in 1964. Harbottle Juniors come on Wednesdays for half a day.Every child has a school dinner.We go swimming on Tuesdays to Rothbury Middle School. We have three play-times per day.
